templates.name: Missing Order / Missing Item
templates.content: Oh no, if you have not received your order or if part of your order is missing, please fill out this contact form: https://contact.gorgias.help/en-US/forms/gygo2d9p

templates.name: Order Tracking
templates.content: To track your order, you would have to log into your account, click on "Orders", and then view the details.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store, but definitely keep an eye out!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Exceptions to the Return Policy
templates.content: You can check out all the exceptions to our return policy here: https://bulbheadsupport.gorgias.help/en-US/exceptions-to-our-return-policy-384112?isEmbedded=true

templates.name: Does BulbHead sell gift cards?
templates.content: At this time, BulbHead does not sell gift cards.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to reach out to us via this email: https://contact.gorgias.help/en-US/forms/gygo2d9p. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/bulbhead_ideas/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/BulbHeadIdeas/

templates.name: How long will it take for a refund to reflect on my payment method?
templates.content: Your refund will be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.

templates.name: Can I apply multiple promo codes?
templates.content: I'm sorry, but only one code can be used at a time.

templates.name: How do I unsubscribe from BulbHeadâ€™s marketing emails?
templates.content: To unsubscribe from BulbHead's marketing emails, please click on the unsubscribe link located in the footer within the email.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes up to 3 days, and once shipped, it will take 3 to 7 business days to arrive.

templates.name: How do I apply a promo code to my purchase?
templates.content: You can edit or remove a promo code by clicking on 'Cancel' on the promo code box within your shopping cart or on the order review section of checkout before you place your order.

templates.name: Is my credit card information kept secure?
templates.content: We use Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to prevent unauthorized people from intercepting your credit card information.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to reach out to us via this link: https://contact.gorgias.help/en-US/forms/gygo2d9p. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.bulbhead.com/pages/rewards

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://bulbheadsupport.gorgias.help/en-US/return-policy-384110?isEmbedded=true

templates.name: Can I get a refund from BulbHead for a product I purchased in a retail store?
templates.content: BulbHead products are subject to the individual retail store's return policy where it was originally purchased. Please return to the store directly.

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://bulbheadsupport.gorgias.help/en-US/our-guarantee-384116?isEmbedded=true

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://contact.gorgias.help/en-US/forms/gygo2d9p. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: How do I redeem my surprise gift promo code?
templates.content: Please visit the provided website link and input your email and phone number to receive a discount on your upcoming order: http://bulbheaddirectgift.com/

templates.name: Refund Policy
templates.content: You can check out our full Refund Policy here: https://bulbheadsupport.gorgias.help/en-US/refunds-384114?isEmbedded=true

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Can I return a BulbHead product that I purchased on Amazon?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we do not accept Amazon returns or exchanges. Please contact the seller directly on Amazon. Items shipped from Amazon.com can be returned to Amazon within 30 days of receipt of shipment in most cases. Some products have different policies or requirements associated with them.

templates.name: What payment types does BulbHead accept?
templates.content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Amazon Pay, and Apple Pay

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over amount $49. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
